createEvent.title: Create a free invitation for your event, meeting or conference
createEvent.subtitle: Event planning is all in vain without participants and guests. Event Logic offers a complete guest management system where you can create stylish invitations with ease. Invite your participants via email, self-registration and / or text message.
createEvent.secondSubtitle: The invitation is a very important part of event planning. Your invitation is the first participants meet in your communication and sets the tone for your event. A good invitation makes them both curious and looking forward to it; a prerequisite for accepting your invitation.
createEvent.description: Whether you're inviting participants to a conference or a more relaxed customer event, you need to plan in good time to give your intended participants the opportunity to make plans for your event.
createEvent.secondDescription: When the invitation reaches your participants, they click the link that takes them to your registration page and submit their personal information. The participants have the opportunity to decline, which is a great function making you able to avoid sending unnecessary reminders to those who already declined your invitation.

withoutKnowledge.title: No previous knowledge required!
withoutKnowledge.subtitle: You do not need any special prerequisites or specific software - you create the invitation quickly and easily with the help of default elements that you fill in with pictures, logos and your content.

saveDate.title: Save the date
saveDate.subtitle: If your plans hasn't come far, but the date is booked, then send a "save the date" that invites your guests to mark the date in there calendar to not miss your event.

reminders.title: Reminders and follow-ups
reminders.subtitle: If you didn't reach your goal in the first invitation, it may be appropriate to send out a reminder. Event Logic will sort which of your participants did not respond so that you only send reminders to participants who haven't yet accepted.
